title: Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 (No 24 of 2019), hereby
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the Local Government Rates and Other
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the Local Government Rates and Other 

Matters Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited local government rate matter act 2019 (commencement) order 2023

title: Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 (No 24 of 2019), hereby
heading: 2. The 6th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 6th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 
2019 (No. 24 of 2019) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 1, 2, 3, 6, 8, 9, 18, 19, 20, 22 and 27; 

(b) Part 1 of the Schedule insofar as it relates to the repeal of the 
enactments mentioned in column (4) opposite the following 
reference numbers in column (1): 

(i) 

number 6 insofar as it relates to section 71 of the Local 
Government (Dublin) Act 1930; 

(ii) number 7 insofar as it relates to section 20 of the Cork 

City Management (Amendment) Act 1941; 

(iii) number 9 insofar as it relates to section 14 of the Local 

Government Act 1946; 

(iv) number 11 insofar as it relates to section 10(2) of the 
Local Government (Financial Provisions) Act 1978; 

(v) number 12 insofar as it relates to Clause I of subparagraph 
(i) of paragraph (b) of subsection (7) of section 103.
text_norm: 2 6th day november 2023 appointed day following provision local government rate matter act 2019 (no 24 2019) shall come operation (a) section 1 2 3 6 8 9 18 19 20 22 27 (b) part 1 schedule insofar relates repeal enactment mentioned column (4) opposite following reference number column (1) (i) number 6 insofar relates section 71 local government (dublin) act 1930 (ii) number 7 insofar relates section 20 cork city management (amendment) act 1941 (iii) number 9 insofar relates section 14 local government act 1946 (iv) number 11 insofar relates section 10(2) local government (financial provisions) act 1978 (v) number 12 insofar relates clause subparagraph (i) paragraph (b) subsection (7) section 103

title: Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 (No 24 of 2019), hereby
heading: 3. The 1st day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 1st day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 
2019 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 4, 5, 7, 10, 11, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17; 

(b) Part 1 of the Schedule insofar as it is not already commenced.
text_norm: 3 1st day january 2024 appointed day following provision local government rate matter act 2019 shall come operation (a) section 4 5 7 10 11 13 14 15 16 17 (b) part 1 schedule insofar already commenced

title: Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 (No 24 of 2019), hereby
heading: 4. The 1st day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 12
text_raw:
4. The 1st day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 12 
of the Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 shall come into 
operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [536] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 November, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [536]
text_norm: 4 1st day january 2025 appointed day section 12 local government rate matter act 2019 shall come operation notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 10th november 2023 536 3 given official seal 3 november 2023 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage 4 536

title: Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 (No 24 of 2019), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 28(5) of the Local Government Rates and 
Other Matters Act 2019 (No. 24 of 2019), this Order appoints the days on 
which certain provisions of the Act come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [536] 5
